content.rendered:
What We Do

We help organizations create long-term value with our Assurance, Consulting, and Tax Advisory services.

Free Consultation
Main Menu
  • Our Company
  • Our Team
  • Company News

AboutA&A Associate LLC

We are A&A Associate LLC , an UAE-based management consultancy that focuses on providing cost-effective value-added services to meet all your business needs. Our approach lays emphasis on meeting the highest standards of quality possible, while at the same time paying attention to professional ethics.

Our team of management experts and business consultants are all highly qualified and come with years of experience in their fields. We can be counted on for Financial Management Advisory, Corporate Finance, Business Consultancy, Business Plan, Feasibility Study, Company Formation, PRO Services, Tax Residency Certificates, Offshore Registration, VAT Compliant Accounting Services, Audit Services, and Liquidation Services.

We provide fresh perspectives and come up with out-of-the-box solutions for all your business needs. If you need help with your business strategy or advice on how to optimize your operations for better efficiency, come talk to us. We are here to provide hands-on support when it comes to driving innovation at your company.

0

Experience

Audit Completed

Our Vision

A&A Associate LLC aspires to become the leader in the MENA region by providing all value added services for businesses to innovate and create business models that greately enhances profitability and sustainability.

Our Mission

Creating happy customers by providing quality services that transform businesses.

We work closely
with all Government Agencies

Starting a business in Dubai. We can help you set up in a Free Zone, on Mainland or Offshore.

Client Testimonials

What Our Valued Customers Say About Us

AMJAD KHAN

Owner, Fitness Tree
Read More
A & A Associate L.L.C has performed numerous business valuations for us over the past several years and I have come to depend on them or complete, accurate and timely results. Robin & Baiju have always found the time to answer my questions and address my concerns. I would recommend them without hesitations.
Ma. Rellyn Eve Zubiri-Aliaga

CEO - Phab Media
Read More
I thank A&A Associate LLC for their professionalism in assisting us obtain a trade license for our online business. We are happy that we made the right decision in choosing them. They are very supportive and patiently answer all our questions. The process was also fast and easy. Overall, their service is excellent.
David Brown-McComb

CEO - Company
Read More
I had the best experience when setting up my company, and it is all due to their professionalism. They stay on top of everything, guide you perfectly, and take care of the entire process. As a result of their diligence, I was able to get my Business License very quickly. They go the extra mile to support you, and I strongly recommend them.
Claire R. Kanj

CEO - Company
Read More
I highly recommend A&A Associate LLC if you are looking for hassle-free and fast business setup consultancy. The process was easy and swift. They followed up regularly with me and made sure they answered all my questions without hesitation. The options they have are limitless and work well for any kind of business.
Kiki Chua

CEO - Company
Read More
As a business owner, I want to work with people I can rely on, who offer the best services and packages. The staff at A&A Associate LLC patiently explained to me everything I needed to know and guided me throughout the process. They were very precise in their answers and helpful with everything. I am very happy and glad to recommend A&A Associate LLC to everyone.
Daniel Elmer

CEO - Company
Read More
An extremely helpful group of professionals. It is amazing how they are so knowledgeable when it comes to matters of company formation in the United Arab Emirates. They go out of their way to help you, patiently answering all your queries and making you feel at ease. Thanks to their support, I had a smooth experience throughout the process.
